amendment.description: To eliminate discrimination and promote women's health and economic security by ensuring reasonable workplace accommodations for workers whose ability to perform the functions of a job are limited by pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6558, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 24. Record Vote Number: 416.
